long_description: This Park Bondhus 3-way allen wrench is a great for those hard-to-reach hex head screws. Made of industrial-quality hardened steel, vinyl coated for comfort and a reliable grip. Ball head Bondhus-style hex wrenches work at an angle of up to 25 degrees. This wrench combines three popular size hex heads (4mm, 5mm, 6 mm) in an easy to use "Y" shape for convenience and extra leverage.
short_description: This Park Bondhus 3-way allen wrench is a great for those hard-to-reach hex head screws.
